content.title: Aortic Dissection Imaging
content.definition: CTA is first-line. Shows intimal flap, true/false lumens, branch involvement. TEE for unstable patients.
content.statement: Aortic Dissection Imaging is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic-Dissection that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Aortic Dissection Imaging helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Aortic Dissection Imaging include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Aortic Dissection Imaging.

clinical_pearls: Key point about Aortic Dissection Imaging
